title: Nested JSON Object Value Retrieval
description: In this lab, we will be exploring how to retrieve nested values from a JSON object based on an array of keys. We will be using the reduce() method to traverse the object's nested structure and retrieve the target value. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to access specific values within a complex JSON object.

steps.title: Get Nested Value in Object Based on Array of Keys

verify.name: Verify Node Usage In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
